questions.question: Which &4CANNOT&r conduct &6electricity&r?
questions.feedback:
CH₃CH₂OH does not have delocalized electrons.

&7Q1 2012 DSE

questions.question: Which is &6Polar &rmolecule?
feedback:
NH₃ has 1 lone pair of electrons.

&7Q5 2012 DSE
H₂O has 1 lone pair of electrons.
CH₃OH has C-H, C-O and O-H polar bond, cannot cancel out.
SO₂ has 1 lone pair of electrons.

questions.question:
&6Silicon Carbide&r has similar structure to &bDiamond&r.
Why is it very hard?
questions.answer: Giant Network Structure with Strong Covalent Bonds
other_options: Silicon and Carbon atoms form &lTriple Bond
Silicon and Carbon have 4 outermost shell electrons
questions.feedback:
Similar structure to Diamond, crystallized structure. Strong Covalent Bond.

&7Q8 2012 DSE
